item.description:
Let's go bowling... be ready to have a great time, listen to some cool tunes, laugh, get glowing, and as usual have some fun.

Remember that we get our shoes free, when you get to the counter let the great guys at the desk know that you are with the Meetup Group!

If you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can give your dues to either Donna or Janet at any event.  Thank you!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

 

We look forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside at the tables as you walk in.
item.name: It's Bowling time again!
